When you ease between two versions of yourself
As all futures spread before you
Treading on and trampling on all your past
There will be a breath in which all songs stall and bring you back to this moment
When suns and stars and moons collide inside your chest
Your lungs will fill with the light of might
And there will be days that tear you apart with the strength of their loss
And nights etched with misguided attempts to end misunderstood lustful endings
While London sits mute and painful beneath the red August sun
And there will be dreams that cast mysterious spells on to your waking hours
And creatures that twist from your belly and crawl nightmarish between the cracks in your day time dreams
And there will be lovers oh there will be lovers to dance with and scream with in grateful exhalation
Those isolated prayers against loneliness
But aging will sweep from you great moments you never knew
And loss will carve your heart
Calcifying into weird and unknowable shapes
And rainbows will chase you into shadows behind old photographs
To prove that anything can come from nothing
And beasts will wait silently behind the locked doors of if
And in that moment all will be lost
And your forgotten self will creep behind you low and beastly
For Persephone stalks your thoughts into sweet regret
And breathing secret never on to every decision to come
And as the song ends so you are done for
For it is true we do not believe what we please
For all is mysterious spells and exotic hell

Raising exotic hell

I prefer the girl when she's alone

Raising exotic hell

entry.title: Averse Sefira - Refractions Of An Unexploded Singularity - lyric

link.title: Averse Sefira - Refractions Of An Unexploded Singularity - lyric

entry.content:
Witness to an endless storming cosmos
Casting towards the cold empty beyond
Beatific flares tear at my skein
Divination strains to chart a course
Hull ignites and alters
To form a hurtling pyre
Flames my panegyric
Will my cynosure
Torrid in resistance
Tearing through the veil
Chaos screaming
Parallax is mine alone
Dreams as navigation
Holds of airless might
Boundaries of compression
Violent in my wake
Tethers slash hide
Layers of time expand
Perception now procumbent
Echoes polarized
Rushing headlong, streaming ashen lies
Terrible portent lodged, drishti binds my mind
Symbiotic predestination
Terminus: divined
Prisons unbound
Mandala divides the light
Tetrarchic prayers
Answer prismatically
Doom spreading from below
Roots anchored in death
Culminate as one
Dissipate as null
Propagating...
Cyclical existence of failure
Punctured through thaumaturgical siege
Immersed in a world of shells
All life within evaporates
Memetic weaponry
Averred against
Gammadion wings
Inferno in my mind
Founder beneath the sun
Thrumming howls of demon
Pushing aside the ruin of thought
Mantled in schematic litanies
Chains of execration
No longer binding me
My essence forged in canopic restraint
Singularity
Reborn in parallax
Extinguishing
The primordial soul
